Enumeration Type Documentation

anonymous enum

Write enable state of SCSI library

enum scsiAscCodes

Additional sense code and additional sense code qualifier values returned in sense data. Note: This is not a full listing, see section 4.5.6 of the SPC specification for a full listing.

enum scsiCommandCodes

Minimum commands required by SPC-3 and SBC-3. Not full listing - see SPC-3 6.1 and SBC 5.1 for full listing.

enum scsiSenseKeyCodes

Sense codes returned in sense data.
Note: This is not a full listing, see section 4.5.6 of the SPC specification for a full listing.

Function Documentation

void processScsiCommand ( scsiTransaction_t *  x )

Parse SCSI command and execute as necessary.
Parse SCSI CDB, execute command (sending and receiving data on data bus and to flash as necessary), and return when complete.

Parameters:
xPointer to SCSI transaction data used in command.
void scsiReset ( void   )

Reset SCSI device

void scsiWriteEnable ( uint8_t  we )

Enable writing to SCSI device
By default SCSI device is read only, but calling this function sets writes state.
When writes are disabled SCSI commands that require writing or erasing fail and set SCSI_SK_DATA_PROTECT in sense data.

Parameters:
weWrite enable value. Nonzero to enable write, 0 to disable write.
